item.title: Evolution of K-POP Groups : From Monoliths to Microservices ğŸ¤ğŸŒŸ
item.description:
K-pop has evolved dramatically over the years, with new generations of idols pushing the boundaries of what we know about the industry. If we take a step back, we can notice an interesting parallel between the growth of K-pop groups and the way we develop software ğŸ˜„!

From the early days of K-pop groups like SES and Girls Generation to the global groups of BLACKPINK and BTS, K-pop groups have undergone a major transformation. This journey can be compared to the shift from monolithic systems to microservices in the tech world! ğŸ¤–ğŸ’»
